posts.post_title: FS: T206 Hal Chase w/trophy (PB) PSA 2 SALE PENDING
posts.post_content:
SALE PENDING  There is a crease running through the middle of the card.  Also, some tobacco spots on the front and back.  Feel free to ask any questions and I will answer in a very timely manner.  

Paypal gift or check accepted.

PM or email: [url]cavelyon@aol.com[/url]
